page.title: 02RECREATION- CHILDREN
page.content: In order to create this report a number of citizens were interviewed and their views recorded in three age brackets.{ {1.CHILDREN Those in the children's age group tend to be more activity minded than the older generations, but they also tend to watch live television more frequently,often up to three or four hours a night ;they also spend more time than the others watching video recordings. Many children play on their BMX bicycles (a current fashion today among the younger members of society). They also play computer games.Few take part in an organised activity outside the house such as Scouting,golf,running or swimming. They say a cinema is required in this area.
